title: Weirdest MYSTERY TECH yet!
description: Thanks to Samsung for sponsoring this episode of MYSTERY TECH! Samsung US -  Amazon US -  Samsung UK -  Amazon UK -    Subscribe to Ken's channel @Denki!  More shenanigans on @thisis:   Subscribe for more!  TikTok:  Instagram:  Twitter:   Chapter Titles ------------------------------- 0:00 Sega Dreamcast 1:35 World's Biggest Mouse (and keyboard?) 3:03 HydraLight 5:06 Samsung T7 Shield SSD 7:14 Codi Robot 8:14 HidrateSpark Bottle 10:05 Sony InZone monitor and headsets
